name: Blockchain Project Manager
para: The Project Manager Blockchain coordinates blockchain processing software issues with other IT organizations including applications and operations.

pathway: Understand the basics: Blockchain technology / Project management methodologies / Software development lifecycle, Build a strong foundation: Smart contracts / Decentralized applications (dApps) / Blockchain platforms, Develop technical and hands-on skills: Internships / Collaborative projects / Individual assignments, Earn certifications: PMP / Certified Blockchain Professional / Scrum Master Certification, Contribute to open-source projects: Hyperledger / Ethereum / GitHub

name: Blockchain Quality Engineer
para: A Blockchain Quality Engineer develops automation frameworks, manual tests, and tests for glitches and bugs. Essentially, the role is all about quality, testing, and automation.
skills: Selenium, Jenkins, Hyperledger, Ethereum, JIRA, Git, Docker
pathway: Understand the basics: Quality assurance principles / Software testing methodologies / Blockchain fundamentals, Build a strong foundation: Automation frameworks / Test automation tools / Continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), Develop technical and hands-on skills: Internships / Collaborative projects / Individual assignments, Earn certifications: ISTQB / Certified Blockchain Professional / Selenium Certification, Contribute to open-source projects: Jenkins / Selenium / GitHub

name: Blockchain Architect
para: At its core, it is a continuously growing list of records, called blocks, linked together using cryptography to form a chain.

name: Front End Developer
para: Builds the front-end portion of websites and web applications—the part users see and interact with.
skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, Vue.js, Bootstrap, Git
pathway: Understand the basics: HTML / CSS / JavaScript , Learn a modern front-end framework: React / Angular / Vue.js , Master version control with Git , Build projects to showcase your skills , Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies

para: Build and maintain websites while looking after cross-platform functionality and compatibility.
skills: Node.js, Express, Django, Flask, Ruby on Rails, SQL, MongoDB, Docker, Git
pathway: Understand the fundamentals: Server, Database, and APIs / Learn a back-end programming language: Node.js, Python, Ruby / Master database management: SQL, NoSQL / Gain experience with frameworks: Express, Django, Flask / Develop and deploy applications

para: Responsible for both front-end and back-end

pathway: Learn front-end and back-end technologies , Build full-stack projects , Master version control with Git , Gain proficiency in a full-stack framework: MERN / MEAN / Django , Deploy and manage applications in the cloud

name: Machine Learning Engineer
para: Responsible for creating programs and algorithms that enable machines to take actions without being explicitly directed. Offers the best prospects for career growth.
